patthana14.14:1.1: Sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana14.14:2.1: Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.14:3.1: Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.14:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
